message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for $1200000. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity that I think you won't want to pass up.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $1250000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'm willing to pay $1150000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle from here.

I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, and I'm willing to make one last push to meet you in the middle. I'm counteroffering at $1225000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm afraid I've reached my limit. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet on price. I'll make one final offer of $1150000, and that's my absolute maximum.
